para1: Your presence on the day is the most important thing to us and we appreciate that many of you will be traveling a long distance to be with us so there really is no need to get us anything. However, if you would like to buy us a gift, we will have a wedding list at El Corte Ingl√©s, which will be available from Spring 2020.
para2: We will provide more information when we send out the formal invitations.
